name: Prototype M
description:
Prototype M is a work-in-progress voxel game, that will ultimately feature exploration, adventure, and a rich procedurally generated environment with engaging co-op combat. We are still very much in the early stages, since the voxel engine is currently being built in-house. This prototype is still a developer build, not even alpha, meant to easily share with our playtesters.

If you happen to stumble upon this project, then please feel free let us know what you think! It is still incredibly WIP, so there may be bugs and other things that are subject to change.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Toggle walk/run
  • CTRL - Drop through platform
  • G - Turn on light
  • T - Open inventory
  • Tab - Change perspective
  • Backslash - Toggle wireframe
  • F11 - Fullescreen

Some useful commands:

  • /give <1 - 13> <1-9999> will give an item with one of the item IDs
  • /top will teleport you to the top of that location
  • /save_world will save the current world
  • /fly will toggle the ability to fly
  • /spawn <0 - 2> will spawn one of the prototype creatures
  • /revive will respawn you with 100 health if you die
  • /respawn takes you back to your spawnpoint
  • /vsync_enable & /vsync_disable will toggle vsync
  • /sens <1-10000> will set the mouse sensitivity
  • /color_rgb <0-255> <0-255> <0-255> will set the closest color of proto block
  • /color_hex (much like /color_rgb, except with a hex string 000000-FFFFFF)
  • /light <1 - 4> will set the light level of a proto light
  • /recycle will clear your inventory
